transcription: Jersey SportsZone's coverage of the Hunt School is being brought to you by Princeton Orthopedic Associates. It feels like all the hard work since I was like four or five years old paid off. I definitely want to thank my mom and dad more intimately and my head coach,  coach Smith and my strength coach, Coach A and really all the teachers, administrators and everyone who's had any type of impact on my life academically and athletically.
